Module com.example.pizasson
Package com.example.pizasson.Controller

Class IngredientController

java.lang.Object
com.example.pizasson.Controller.IngredientController
public class IngredientController extends Object
This class is in charge of modifying the elements of the ingredient information box view The class gets the attributes of the pizzaIngredient to create an observable information box to show on screen
Author:
Santiago Caballero
